LanguageData.TiberiumResearchBench.label: tiberium research station
LanguageData.TiberiumResearchBench.description:
A specialized research bench for Tiberium technologies.

Research is sped up by the high-tech tools.

Requires power.
LanguageData.TiberiumResearchCraftingBench.label: Tiberium research crafting adapter
LanguageData.TiberiumResearchCraftingBench.descriptio: This building allows the crafting of Tiberium information items.
